summary: An ordinance accepting easements over portions of Block 3, Steel Plant Addition (Vacation, 26th Place Southwest, City Comptroller's File No. 270132); over a portion of the NE 1/4 of Section 30, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., (West Marginal Way Southwest, Sanitary Sewer); over a portion of West Marginal Way Southwest, formerly Detroit Ave., as shown on the Plat of McLaughlin's Water Front Addition (Vacation, West Marginal Way Southwest, City Comptroller's File No. 269577) for storm drain and sanitary sewer purposes.
